ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( OR(RecordType.DeveloperName ='MAiD_Case', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Error_Log'), AND( ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), "Closed"), $UserRole.Name = "MAiD Analyst") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have access to re-open this case.
